actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5594) to amend titles 18 and 28 of the United States Code with respect to bail, the exclusionary rule, habeas corpus, and capital punishment, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5594 (criminal procedure).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5594) to amend titles 18 and 28 of the United States Code with respect to bail, the exclusionary rule, habeas corpus, and capital punishment, and for other purposes.
